page.title: 13The "Corner Shop".
page.content: In our built up area there are many "corner shops" still in existence. They not only sell food, but many other items; from birthday cards to shoe laces.Also, some now have a video hire section to supplement their income. Many corner shops now struggle to survive because of people travelling to supermarkets to buy groceries. Therefore they have to stay open late at night and on Sunday mornings to boost their income. If a new proposed law is passed, allowing Sunday trading for large stores,the" corner shop"may well disappear.Competition would be too fierce.
